name: Ch.7BaseConvo2
_source: speak;Seth;It looks like we'll be resting here for a little bit.|The troops have been working hard lately.
speak;Eirika;They have been.|I should go and see if they are holding up ok.
speak;Seth;Wait, I fear you might be pushing yourself too hard lately, Princess.
speak;Eirika;I'm ok Seth, I just want to do what I can for everyone.|We can't afford to lose...
speak;Seth;Do you doubt yourself, my Lord?
speak;Eirika;Everything just happened so fast.|I don't know what to think anymore...
speak;Seth;Princess, draw your sword.|I'm going to help you improve your swordmanship.
speak;Seth;I can't stop you from doubting many things, but I can help you not doubt your own blade.|Draw it and we'll start practicing.
alert;Eirika gained some WEXP in swords!
